# Course Topics

- The R programming language and Bioconductor
  - Introduction to the R environment
  - Basic linux/unix command-line
  - R data structures
  - Manipulating data in data frames and matrices
  - Plotting and data visualization
  - Distributions
  - Hypothesis testing
  - Exploratory data analysis
- Statistical concepts
  - Statistical distributions
  - P-values
  - Bayes theorem
  - Multiple testing correction
  - Dimensionality reduction
  - Weight matrices
  - Regression
  - Linear models
  - Introductory machine learning
- Biological domains
  - RNA-seq quantification, normalization, and differential expression
  - Gene set enrichment analysis
  - Expression QTLs
  - Allele specific expression
  - Single-cell transcriptomics
  - ATAC-seq
  - DNA and transcription factor binding
  - DNA methylation
- Computation and programming
  - Linux/unix command line
  - Literate programming (R markdown)
  - Version control with git
  - Building an R package
